Class SearchBookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AbstractController
      • controllers.SystemController

  • public class SearchBookController
extends SystemController
    Search book controller is the controller of the search book page.
    Author:
    guyzi

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method initializes the controller.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class SystemController

      • searchOnEnterPressed

        public void searchOnEnterPressed()
        This method is called when the search button is clicked, or when Enter key is pressed. Sends the input query to the server.

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(Message msg)
        This method implements the abstract controller method.
        Specified by:
        handleMessage in class AbstractController
        Parameters:
        msg - case 1: The message is an object array. index 0 - Book array. index 1 - Author matrix, each index is an array of authors of the matching book in the book array. index 2 - Fields matrix. index 3 - Subject matrix. If the book array is empty, no result message is displayed, else the book grid is set according to this data.

      • setBookGrid

        public void setBookGrid()
        This method sets the book grid with books, and event handlers for each book. The book grid is added to the scroll anchor.
